item.title: Epic Lure Video 120m + in total :)
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:29, topic:390174”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=486085.msg3562195#msg3562195 date=1302366234]

Let’s not start with the scamming conversation again, lol.

idk MITB is pretty big on this kind of issue…

Cool video, but it does seem a little faked… Like you asked your friends to do it with you…
[/quote]
I don’t thing MITB would lift a finger or even care that were scamming on runescape, as long as were not scamming each other he doesn’t give a shit, and to be honest its not really scamming, if your stupid enough to go out in the wildy with your stuff cause some guy wants to give you money out their its your own fault you lost it.[/quote]
They banned Pure2Ownage for that, did they not?

Read full topic

item.title: Epic Lure Video 120m + in total :)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:25, topic:390174”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=486085.msg3562665#msg3562665 date=1302395693]
Oh yes, because people go into those places with no food. So fake…
[/quote]

“Lure”

There is a reason many of them only have three main items, like the guy with dragon plate, dragon legs and dragon claws - he’ll give him the 60k which out values the claws and then he kills him getting the claws.[/quote]Watch the video again. The first two dont even look like lures in the first place, one guy has all of his combat stuff and the second one is on ancients.

The third (dfs guy) also has all armour and a lot of monks, but never eats?

Don’t know about the rest, there look like a few real lures in there (except the possibility of friends)

Read full topic

Kid follows (chump)

Kid gets jumped, killed and looted (lured).

item.title: Epic Lure Video 120m + in total :)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I used to be a great pk’er back before wild was removed. Cept I didn’t take advantage like that, I just waiting for people 80+ (f2p) would get done with their amazing battles (i was lvl 67 while doing this), while they had low hp, and a short on food. Made an easy prey, and typically they would have 2-3 armor sets (this includes their own) of rune or addy. I think I would generally make 600-800k a trip like this.

Read full topic
